scripts.build: npm run install-deps && npm run build-frontend
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed. Checking contents:' && ls -la frontend/dist && echo 'Files count:' && find frontend/dist -type f | wc -l
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
